article_title: Press of Atlantic City: Southern New Jersey Business & Money
article_text:
SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti, 57, of Wildwood Crest, owner of The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood, walks outside to show property of a seasonal outdoor workout space. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti, 57, of Wildwood Crest, in on of the many workout rooms in The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood that has been fully renovated and improved with help from a U.S. Small Business Administration-backed loan. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti, 57, of Wildwood Crest purchased The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood and fully renovated and improved the facility with help from a U.S. Small Business Administration-backed loan. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti, 57, of Wildwood Crest purchased The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood and fully renovated and improved the facility including a custom clothing press that prints their own designs on their apparel, with help from a U.S. Small Business Administration-backed loan. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti, 57, of Wildwood Crest, in on of the many workout rooms in The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood that has been fully renovated and improved with help from a U.S. Small Business Administration-backed loan. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Brothers Joe (left) and Mike Sparano (right), 3 months ago bought AABA Family Medical Supply in the Villas and received an SBA-backed loan to purchase the existing business. The inventory includes chair lifts that act as elevators in a household. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Brothers Mike (left) and Joe Sparano (right), bought AABA Family Medical Supply in the Villas 3 months ago and received an SBA-backed loan to purchase the existing business. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Karl Belfonti (left), 57, of Wildwood Crest, owner of The Gym at 10th Street in North Wildwood, goes over the plan for the day at the snack bar with employee Nick DePetris (right), 72, of North Wildwood. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

SBA LOANS Brothers Mike (left) and Joe Sparano (right), bought AABA Family Medical Supply in the Villas 3 months ago and received an SBA-backed loan to purchase the existing business. Wednesday, December 9. (The Press of Atlantic City/ Viviana Pernot)

og.description: Getting a business loan proved tricky when Douglas and Andriana Marandino started Cape May Honey Farm about three years ago.
og.title: Small-business loans on the rise in South Jersey
